DOC.brief_title: Mood Management Effects Brief Unsupported Internet Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: The main goal study compare effect one-session unsupported Internet intervention participant ' clinical symptom ( depressive anxiety symptom ) relate variable ( mood , confidence motivation ) . Method : A total 765 adult reside United States take part randomize controlled trial . Participants randomly assign one five brief plain text intervention last five ten minute . The intervention design address depressive symptom : Thoughts ( increase helpful thought ) , Activities ( increase activity level ) , Sleep Hygiene , Assertiveness ( increase assertiveness awareness ) , Own Methods ( utilize method previously successful ) . They followed-up one week consenting .
